basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers with a short period time，flower color orange red
basic.color: Leaf color blue green and will turn red with enough sunlight

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Enjoy sufficient sunlight, temporary dormancy in summer, put in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil surface is dry, reduce water during dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
